layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x600
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x584
      LayoutTable {TABLE} at (0,0) size 248x584 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (1,1) size 246x582
          LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,0) size 246x562
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (0,271) size 246x20 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (1,1) size 229x18
                text run at (1,1) width 229: "Table cell without height restriction"
          LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,562) size 246x20
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (0,562) size 246x20 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=1 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (1,1) size 244x18
                text run at (1,1) width 244: "This table cell should be 5 pixels high"
